name: Jelly Wobble Slice n Dash - Cut the pudding drop and avoid the Mania
name_original: Jelly Wobble Slice n Dash - Cut the pudding drop and avoid the Mania
description:
Swipe, slash and slice your way through 50 deliciously fruity puzzle levels. Test your wits and reaction skills to the limit and let the fun begin with Fruit Jelly Slash!

In this super neat jelly puzzler game, your aim is to keep all the Jelly Cubes together by slicing away at each bouncy level, whatever you do, don’t let them escape!

Why not grab yourself some fruity power ups including time warps, instant wipe outs and super mega bombs, all waiting for addiction fanatics who wanna just get wobbling to the next level.

Slice your way to the top of the Game Centre Leaderboards and challenge your friends.

Features:

- 50 Puzzle levels for puzzle addicts everywhere
- Cool Power up Store
- Game Centre Leaderboards
